items.preText:
Liton Das to take first strike, with Nazmul Hossain at the other end. Aftab Alam has the ball. One slip. 3.28pm National anthems done. Bangladesh's openers walking out Afghanistan's huddle done. This will be the first time in this Asia Cup that they're bowling first. How will they go?
Nafis: "@Md. Ebrahim Mehidy Hasan came from the under-19's too and flourished in intl. cricket. However, Nazmul Hossain seems to be very under developed. He needs to play more domestic cricket along with playing in the A team rather than just being in the intl. squad."

saikot: "All on a sudden people are going crazy to include Soumya and Imrul in the team. Here is a humble question. What so revolutionary they did in regard of their technique in this very short time after they got sacked from the team? Not much I guess. Both BD selectors and fans are incredibly impatient"

Inteser: "Is Imrul Kayes going to open or is he going to slot in the middle order? If he opens, where will Shanto bat, at 3 or down the order?" --- I think it's fair to say that if the selectors don't know, then neither do I...

Aayan Bashar: "I think they should've brought Soumya instead of Liton. Soumya is extremely lethal in form. Bangladesh needs to play him matches to get him back into form. Remember the old Soumya and Bangladesh opening. The invincible duos! Even after losing form his batting average remains 34.5."

Wily_Fox: "Afghanistan team is a great example of how teams can succeed if each player gives their 100% even with limited skills. Their techniques and strategies are not always pleasing to the eyes, but they wouldn't leave even an ounce of energy unspent on the field..reminds a bit of Newzealand sides of past.. "

Saurabh: "I am more excited for this match than India vs Pakistan. This match decides the fate of one team in tournament and almost seals it. I feel this will be a thriller and India vs Pakistan will be another heavily one sided affair."

Md. Ebrahim Kha: "The pipeline of selecting a cricketer in Bangladesh is very weak. Once a player from Under-19 gets hundred or a bowler gets 3-4 wickets, he gets call to play in Best Eleven."

Bangladesh XI: Liton Das, Nazmul Shanto, Shakib Al Hasan, Mushfiqur Rahim (wk), Mahmudullah, Imrul Kayes, Mohammad Mithun, Mahsrafe Mortaza (capt.), Mehidy Hasan, Mustafizur Rahman, Nazmul Islam

Afghanistan XI: Mohammad Shahzad (wk), Ihsanullah, Rahmat Shah, Hashmatullah Shahidi, Samiullah Shenwari, Asghar Afghan (capt.), Mohammad Nabi, Gulbadin Naib, Rashid Khan, Aftab Alam, Mujeeb Ur Rahman

Asghar Afghan: Honestly in this type of condition everyone wants to bat first. Had a bit of a rest and now it's an important game. Nowadays Afghanistan team doesn't come to play cricket, we come to win matches.

Afghanistan have replaced Najibullah Zadran with Samiullah Shenwari. Mashrafe Mortaza: We have to play with some confidence, we need to back ourselves and our techniques. You can't improve those in the middle of the series, you have to back them. Just some swimming and gym in the recovery, lots of fluids, hopefully boys have receovered well. Bangladesh have brought in Nazmul Islam and Imrul Kayes. The latter is replacing Mosaddek Hossain. Full line-ups shortly. 3pm Bangladesh have won the toss and elected to bat.

Sharif Ahmed: "I think experiences is the important factor in the surface of Dubai. Imrul and Shomay will be the right changes for Bangladesh"

Md. Ebrahim Kha: "I think Somya and Kayes both should be included for opening. Liton scored 13 runs in last 3 matches and Shanto too not seems ready to play in International ODI. "

Hafiz Noor: "Both teams are in same situation, but Afghan players are more confident than Banladesh player, because they top the group and hope to continue to the final Insha Allah"

It's not all good in the Bangladesh camp though. They've reinforced their batting department with the selections of Imrul Kayes and Soumya Sarkar - but it seems none of the important leaders were consulted. Shashank Kishore heard Mashrafe Mortaza's lament upon the lack of discussion on the selections, and Isam explored a question - does Bangladesh even need selectors?

2:40pm Good afternoon and welcome back to our coverage of the Asia Cup. The last time we were live, Afghanistan nearly smashed through another landmark in their impressive climb on the world stage. Today, they'll face Bangladesh who, on that same evening, were blown away by India. One team comes in with heartbreak, one probably thinking they have nothing to lose. Two crucial Super Four points are up for grabs. A loss today all but eliminates one of these teams - there will be a slim chance, but it's not a position they want to be in.

Here is Mohammed Isam's preview of the contest.
items.text: starts off wide outside offstump and swinging further away, called a wide
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length outside off, he opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: stays over the wicket to the left-hander, on the leg stumps and tucked away. Straight to square leg
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: keeps it straight, on a length and angling slightly across, he defends in front of off stump
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: fuller and a hint of movement across the batsman, who squirts it off the outside edge towards gully
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: hit on the pads too early into the shot. On leg stump and he tried to turn it away, but was struck on the pads
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: that's a well-run two. On leg stump again and this time he can tuck it away towards fine leg, where there is no fielder. They call quickly for the second and Nazmul puts in the dive when getting back to be safely home.
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 2 runs

items.preText: Nayeem: "At least they didn't change the opening combination, that's the only positive side in the build up of the match."
items.text: overpitched and drifting down the pads, he's able to flick it away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: on a length outside off, punched towards point
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: takes a half step forward and punches this down the ground, past the bowler to long-off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 1 run

items.text: that's almost an inswinger! wobbles in the air and comes in, he defends it from the stumps
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, no run

items.text: picked the length early that time, got down on one knee to sweep hard but straight to square leg, who had to take a few steps to his lef tto field the ball
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full toss punched back straight past the bowler, and the fielder at long-off has to run around and put in the dive to prevent the boundary
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 2 runs

items.preText: Zmn: "This is perhaps the maiden time, Afghans are bowling first in this Asia Cup. Very important to see how they do here?" - Yes it is their first time obwling first
items.text: keeps it straight and fullish, clipped to mid-on
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length outside off and comes back in a touch. He lets it go through to the keeper
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: gives him the charge, steps out and flicks it over the circle to square leg
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: length ball outside off, he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off and they go through for a quick single
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the pads, he turns it away to square leg
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: goes fuller that time and on the stumps, dug out back to the bowler's right and he fields the ball
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: length ball on off and turning in a bit, punched back past the bowler. Mid-on dives but sloppily and they can take the single
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full and on the stumps, he defends off the front foot
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: quicker one fired in at the stumps, he defends on the legside
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: a bit more flight, and he comes forward to turn it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: quicker on the stumps and defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

items.text: some more air on that and fuller outside off, he drives it but straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run
